pr_title: Move Jenkins build process to Pipelines & make templates configurable.

timeline.message: Start with supporting Pipelines for Jenkins.
Work on C, Java with static SCA templates.
Add documentation regarding setup of remote agent.
Improve URL replacing on exercise creation.
Fix fallback detection when creating new exercises.
Add option to make templates configurable.
Add docker label to agents. Fix exercise import.
Add documentation on programming exercise specific values.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be jenkinsService.getDockerImageName(programmingLanguage) instead considering you removed the hardcoded "c" from resourcePath?
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: Codacy is complaining here: These nested if statements could be combined
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the reminder, I actually prefer the current version if that is also fine for you.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.message: Also remove path from remote agents.

timeline.bodyText: Is this variable always set? You could make this Optional and then check it if its empty in the methods.
timeline.author: kloessst

replies.bodyText:
I first tried it with Optionals, but it somehow was either an Optional with a value or null, never Optional.empty.
I'll try it again.
replies.author: sleiss

replies.bodyText: I changed it to Optionals now.
replies.author: sleiss

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible that there are multiple hidden elements?
timeline.author: kloessst

replies.bodyText:
I'm not aware of that.
I could change the if to a while, that would solve the issue, but I'm not sure if this causes any other issues.
replies.author: sleiss

replies.bodyText: I don't know the format, but I trust you on this 😄
replies.author: kloessst

timeline.bodyText: DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssX") could move this out of the loops.
timeline.author: kloessst
